result.title: How much A2 oj is helpful ?
result.content: Is A2 oj really helpful to improve my rating in codeforces ? And when practicing in codeforces how to choose difficulty level of question as a newbie or pupil ? Note : I can solve div-2 A easily but div-2 B is hard to me and I can't solve div-2 C with out reading editorial (But I have to spend huge time to understand the editorial of C ). Thanks in advance. : )
